article: minister of foreign affairs james huang admitted thursday that there are some `` unusual signs '' in diplomatic relations with malawi and that the ministry of foreign affairs -lrb- mofa -rrb- is on `` high alert '' following reports that china is trying to lure the country away from taiwan with a promise of us$ # billion in aid .
abstract: taiwan guards against changes in ties with malawi
